Name: Blinker
Ingredients: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Back in the 1940s, in his book The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks , David Embury said of this cocktail, " One of a few cocktails using grapefruit juice. Not particularly good but not too bad. " Depending on your ingredients: choice of rye whiskey, freshness of grapefruit juice, and particularly use of homemade pomegranate juice grenadine, Embury may have underestimated this cocktail's potential.
History: First published in Patrick Gavin Duffy's 1934 The Official Mixer's Manual .
Nutrition: One serving of Blinker contains 169 calories
